00019 class Page404 ( rend.Page ):
00020 
00021     def render_title ( self, ctx, data ):
00022         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00023         return "Currently browsing  %s" % ( "/".join(request.prepath[1:]), )
00024 
00025     def render_body ( self, ctx, data ):
00026         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00027         return "Not Found"

00029     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00030         T.html [ T.head [ T.title [ render_title ] ],
00031                  T.body [ render_body ]
00032         ]
00033     )

00035 class RenderEvaluation ( rend.Page ):
00036     
00037     def render_title ( self, ctx, data ):
00038         return "Title"
00039     
00040     def render_body ( self, ctx, data ):
00041         [name,version]= inevow.IRequest ( ctx ).path.split("/")[-2:]
00042         document = builder.build(name, version,"..")
00043         return builder.assembleSheet(document,"..")
00044     
00045     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00046         T.html [ T.head [ T.title [ render_title ] ],
00047                  T.body [ render_body ]
00048         ]
00049     )

00051 class ReportsPage ( rend.Page ):
00052 
00053     def locateChild ( self, ctx, segments ):
00054         return ( Page404(), () )

00056 class ReportEvaluation ( rend.Page ):
00057     
00058     def locateChild ( self, ctx, segments ):
00059         [name,version]= inevow.IRequest ( ctx ).path.split("/")[-2:]
00060         document = builder.build(name, version,"..")
00061         tmp = "/".join(["","tmp","-".join([name,version])])
00062         file = open(tmp,'w')
00063         file.write(builder.assembleSheet(document,".."))
00064         file.close()
00065         return (static.File(tmp), ())
00066 #        return ( RenderEvaluation(), () )
00067     
00068 class SubPage ( rend.Page ):
00069     
00070     def render_title ( self, ctx, data ):
00071         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00072         return "Currently browsing  %s" % ( "/".join(request.prepath[1:]), )
00073     
00074     def body ( self, ctx, data ):
00075         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00076         path = "/".join(request.prepath[1:])
00077         body = [ T.h1 [path] ]
00078         body.extend([T.p [ T.a ( href = 'repository/'+path+'/'+dir ) [ dir.split(".")[:-1] ] ] for dir in os.listdir("../sheets/"+path)])
00079         return body
00080     
00081     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00082         T.html [  T.head [ T.title [ render_title ] ], 
00083                   body
00084                  ]
00085         )
00086     
00087     
00088 class EvaluationPage ( rend.Page ):
00089

00091         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00092         return "Currently browsing  %s" % ( "/".join(request.prepath[1:]), )
00093     
00094     def body ( self, ctx, data ):
00095         request = inevow.IRequest ( ctx )
00096         path = "/".join(request.prepath[1:])
00097         body = [ T.h1 [path] ]
00098         body.extend([ [ T.p [
00099                              T.a ( href = "/".join(["evaluations",dir,version]) )
00100                              [ dir + "-" + version ]
00101                              ] for version in os.listdir("../sheets/"+path+'/'+dir)]
00102                       for dir in os.listdir("../sheets/"+path)])
00103         return body
00104     
00105     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00106         T.html [  T.head [ T.title [ render_title ] ], 
00107                   body
00108                  ]
00109         )
00110     
00111     def childFactory ( self, ctx, name ):
00112         return ReportEvaluation()

00114 class MainPage ( rend.Page ):
00115     body = [ T.h1 ["/"] ]
00116     body.extend([T.p [ T.a ( href = 'repository/'+dir ) [ dir ] ]for dir in os.listdir("../sheets")])
